form.enableCookies: Cookies must be enabled to login

validation.VALID_PHONE_FORMAT: Must be a valid phone number
validation.VALID_EMAIL_ADDRESS_FORMAT: Must be a valid email address

documentation.tooltip: Click to read more (opens in new tab)

manageApplications.title: Applications
manageApplications.description:
Applications act as a template for Policies, and group Policies together for easier management.
To create an Application, click Add New Application. To edit an Application, click the Edit Application icon. To view the Policies within an Application, click the Application name. To delete an Application, select it, and then click Delete Selected.

editApplications.title: Create Application
editApplications.description: To configure an Application, begin with Step 1 and progress through to Step 3. Modifications can be made after the Application has been created.

managePolicies.description:
Policies define the rules used to determine whether to grant or deny access to a resource.
To create a Policy, click Add New Policy. To edit a Policy, click the Policy name. To delete a Policy, select it, and then click Delete Selected.

editPolicies.title: Create Policy
editPolicies.description: To configure a Policy, begin with Step 1 and progress through to Step 7. Modifications can be made after the Policy has been created.
editPolicies.deleteLogical: Deleting will also remove any child objects
editPolicies.manageRulesDescription: To define rules, click the Condition or Logical buttons above, enter the relevant options, and then drag the block into place in the rule set above. Each block can be configured both before and after is has been moved. Only rules inside the rule set section will be included in the created policy. To edit a Condition, click the pencil icon, or double-click the item.

manageReferrals.description:
Referrals enable Applications and Policies to exist in different Realms, and redirect requests to those Realms as required.
To create a Referral, click Add New Referral. To edit a Referral, click the Referral name. To delete a Referral, select it, and then click Delete Selected.

editReferrals.title: Create Referral
editReferrals.description: To configure a Referral, begin with Step 1 and progress through Step 4. Modifications can be made after the Referral has been created.
editReferrals.selectRealmsDescription: Referrals can only redirect to a sibling or child Realm. Select a Realm in the Available realms field, and then click the Add button. To remove a Realm, click the Delete button.

responseAttributes.subjectAttributesDescription: Use the drop down list or start typing to search for Subject attributes.
responseAttributes.subjectAttributesPlaceholder: Select or search for Subject attributes

summaryReview.applicationDescription: Review the Application configuration, and then click Finish to save.
summaryReview.policyDescription: Review the Policy configuration, and then click Finish to save.
summaryReview.referralDescription: Review the Referral configuration, and then click Finish to save.

SimpleTime.title: Time (day, date, time, and timezone)
SimpleTime.helper: A time condition must contain one or more of the following values: Time (Start and End), Day (Start and End), Date (Start and End) and/or Time Zone.

conditionTypes.legacyFormat: This condition is in a legacy format, and should be replaced.
